Package com.i2group.apollo.securityapi

Contains custom extension points relating to security.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IPrincipalProvider A provider of information about a Principal, including its "access" and "grant" rights.
IUserDataSourceProvider A provider of information about which external DataSources the current user has access to.
 

Package com.i2group.apollo.securityapi Description

Contains custom extension points relating to security.

The interfaces in this package permit individual deployments to integrate with existing security systems.

Note: These interfaces are highly interrelated. When overriding one aspect of system security, it is often necessary to override others as well.

Since:
1.0
